disclaimer: This is auto generated PROTOCOL. Data have to be revised manually. Based on https://documents.blackmagicdesign.com/DeveloperManuals/BlackmagicCameraControl.pdf

characteristics.name: Camera Manufacturer
characteristics.description: Read the name of the manufacturer (always “Blackmagic Design”)

characteristics.name: Camera Model
characteristics.description: Read the name of the camera model (eg. “URSA Mini Pro”)

characteristics.name: Incoming Camera Control
characteristics.description: Request notifications for this characteristic to receive Camera Control messages from the camera

characteristics.name: Timecode
characteristics.description: Timecode (HH:MM:SS:mm) is represented by a 32-bit BCD number: (eg. 09:12:53:10 = 0x09125310)

characteristics.name: Camera Status
characteristics.decription: Request notifications for this characteristic to receive camera status updates. The camera status is represented by flags contained in an 8-bit integer: None = 0x00 Camera Power On = 0x01 Connected = 0x02 Paired = 0x04 Versions Verified = 0x08 Initial Payload Received = 0x10 Camera Ready = 0x20

characteristics.name: Device Name
characteristics.decription: Send a device name to the camera (max. 32 characters). The camera will display this name in the Bluetooth Setup Menu

characteristics.name: Protocol Version
characteristics.description: Read this value to determine the camera’s supported CCU protocol version

aperture_ordinal.name: Aperture (ordinal)
aperture_ordinal.interpretation: Steps through available aperture values from minimum (0) to maximum (n)

set_absolute_zoom_mm.name: Set absolute zoom (mm)
set_absolute_zoom_mm.interpretation: Move to specified focal length in mm, from minimum (0) to maximum (max)

set_absolute_zoom_normalised.name: Set absolute zoom (normalised)
set_absolute_zoom_normalised.interpretation: Move to specified focal length: 0.0 = wide, 1.0 = tele

set_continuous_zoom_speed.name: Set continuous zoom (speed)
set_continuous_zoom_speed.interpretation: Start/stop zooming at specified rate: -1.0 = zoom wider fast, 0.0 = stop, +1 = zoom tele fast

gain_up_to_camera_4_9.note: 128 is out of range int8, change to 127
gain_up_to_camera_4_9.name: Gain (up to Camera 4.9)

set_auto_wb.name: Set auto WB
set_auto_wb.interpretation: Calculate and set auto white balance

restore_auto_wb.name: Restore auto WB
restore_auto_wb.interpretation: Use latest auto white balance setting

exposure_ordinal.name: Exposure (ordinal)
exposure_ordinal.interpretation: Steps through available exposure values from minimum (0) to maximum (n)

set_auto_exposure_mode.name: Set auto exposure mode
set_auto_exposure_mode.interpretation: 0 = Manual Trigger, 1 = Iris, 2 = Shutter, 3 = Iris + Shutter, 4 = Shutter + Iris

shutter_angle.name: Shutter angle
shutter_angle.interpretation: Shutter angle in degrees, multiplied by 100

shutter_speed.name: Shutter speed
shutter_speed.interpretation: Shutter speed value as a fraction of 1, so 50 for 1/50th of a second

nd_filter.name: ND Filter
nd_filter.interpretation: f-stop of ND filter to use

input_type.name: Input type
input_type.interpretation: 0 = internal mic, 1 = line level input, 2 = low mic level input, 3 = high mic level input

overlay_enables.name: Overlay enables
overlay_enables.interpretation: bit flags: [0] = display status, [1] = display frame guides Some cameras don't allow separate control of frame guides and status overlays.

overlays_replaces_1_and_2_above_from_cam.name: Overlays (replaces .1 and .2 above from Cameras 4.0)
overlays_replaces_1_and_2_above_from_cam.interpretation: bit flags: [0] = display thirds, [1] = display cross hairs, [2] = display center dot, [3] = display horizon

color_bar_enable.name: Color bar enable
color_bar_enable.interpretation: 0 = disable bars, 1-30 = enable bars with timeout (seconds)

tally_brightness.name: Tally brightness
tally_brightness.interpretation: Sets the tally front and tally rear brightness to the same level. 0.0 = minimum, 1.0 = maximum

front_tally_brightness.name: Front tally brightness
front_tally_brightness.interpretation: Sets the tally front brightness. 0.0 = minimum, 1.0 = maximum

rear_tally_brightness.name: Rear tally brightness
rear_tally_brightness.interpretation: Sets the tally rear brightness. 0.0 = minimum, 1.0 = maximum Tally rear brightness cannot be turned off

location.name: Location
location.interpretation: BCD - sDDDdddddddddddd where s is the sign: 0 = west (-), 1 = east (+); DDD degrees, dddddddddddd decimal degrees

transport_mode.name: Transport mode
transport_mode.interpretation: 0 = CFast card, 1 = SD Card, 2 = SSD Recorder, 3 = USB

pan_tilt_velocity.name: Pan/Tilt Velocity
pan_tilt_velocity.interpretation: -1.0 = full speed down, 1.0 = full speed up

signaling_tally.name: Signaling tally
signaling_tally.interpretation: Custom: 0 = clear actual signal, 1 = tally_lock (yellow), 2 = attention (yellow blink), 3 = attention (blue)

set_tally.name: Set tally
set_tally.interpretation: Destination address for group_id 128 is not controlled. This message is ment for 255 aka Broadcast. 1 byte = pvw / 0-255, 2 byte = pgm / 0-255, Values represents camera ID

set_tally_color.name: Set tally color
set_tally_color.interpretation: Custom: Set RGB color to tally RR GG BB AA

notify.name: Notify
notify.interpretation: Custom: 0 = disconnected, 1 = connected, 2 = connecting, 3 = need passcode, 4 = need passcode, 5 = timeout

connect.name: Connect
connect.interpretation: Custom: Connect to camera MAC address
